## Mayor

![Mayor Jay Kahn headshot](https://keenenh.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Mayor-Jay-Kahn-200x300.jpg)

![Downtown Keene in the winter](https://keenenh.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/snowy-downtown-website-image_0.png)

**Mayor Jay Kahn**  
3 Washington St., Keene, NH  03431         
(603) 357-9805  
[mayor@keenenh.gov](mailto:mayor@keenenh.gov)

[View All of the Mayor’s News](https://keenenh.gov/news/department/mayor)
